description: Miso paste and pumpkin is a perfect match in this roasted pumpkin, beef and noodle salad. Try this easy dinner recipe for a hearty, budget-friendly meal.
name: Roasted Pumpkin, Beef & Noodle Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch baby pak choy, cut crosswise into thirds
1 red capsicum, halved, deseeded, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Place pumpkin on tray. Rub miso over pumpkin. Season. Drizzle with half of the vegetable oil. Bake for 30 minutes or until pumpkin is tender.

Meanwhile, cook noodles in a saucepan of boiling water according to packet instructions, adding pak choy to pan for the last 30 seconds of cooking. Drain. Refresh under cold water, then drain. Transfer to a large bowl.

Heat remaining vegetable oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook beef for 3 minutes on each side for medium or until cooked to your liking. Transfer to a plate, cover loosely with foil and rest for 5 minutes. Thinly slice.
Meanwhile, whisk soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, kecap manis and sesame oil in a small bowl.
Add dressing, beef and capsicum to noodle mixture and toss to combine. Divide noodle mixture among bowls. Place noodle salad on plates, top with pumpkin and serve.
